title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build Enterprise AI Apps Faster: Amazon Bedrock's Multimodal Solutions -AIM3341
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 更快构建企业级AI应用：Amazon Bedrock的多模态解决方案 -AIM3341
abstract: Enterprise developers face challenges processing diverse unstructured content across multiple formats, often requiring complex integration of various AI services. Learn how Amazon Bedrock Data Automation simplifies AI application development by unifying workflows for documents, audio, images, and video into a single service. Through Air's success story discover how Bedrock Data Automation helps streamline content processing, optimizes price-performance, and enables customized insights generation. See how teams can accelerate their journey from experimentation to production while maintaining flexibility to use existing AI services where needed.
abstract_cn: 企业开发人员在处理多种格式的各类非结构化内容时面临挑战，通常需要复杂地集成各种AI服务。了解Amazon Bedrock Data Automation如何通过将文档、音频、图像和视频的工作流程统一到单一服务中，简化AI应用程序开发。通过Air的成功案例，探索Bedrock Data Automation如何帮助简化内容处理、优化性价比，并实现定制化洞察生成。了解团队如何在保持灵活性以便在需要时使用现有AI服务的同时，加速从实验到生产的旅程。
